channel.title: Matrix help (Original fromdragonkk)
channel.description:
I have 2 questions:
1. Why is Matrix so laggy? How can I fix it?
2. Where do I change myself to owned/mod/admin? What file/directory is it in?

item.title: Matrix help (Original fromdragonkk)
item.dc:creator: @angelofdeath396 angelofdeath396
item.description:
@angelofdeath396 wrote:

[quote=“looted y00, post:2, topic:455213”]2. usually character file

just log off, search your username.
find your username file go in there and change

character rights = 0
or something like that
to
character rights = 3
or something like that[/quote]

It doesn’t work. It’s in some weird format and it’s called a “P” file.

Also, I looked in several other places
I mean,

Read full topic
